statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT customer_name, inquiry_type FROM customers WHERE interaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, interaction_details FROM customers ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT inquiry_type FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE inquiry_type = 'Complaint' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND inquiry_type = 'Feedback'
SELECT customer_name, interaction_date AS last_interaction, inquiry_type FROM customers WHERE inquiry_type = 'Information' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC
SELECT customer_name, interaction_details FROM customers WHERE inquiry_type = 'Support' AND interaction_details IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers, inquiry_type FROM customers GROUP BY inquiry_type HAVING COUNT(customer_id) > 2 ORDER BY total_customers DESC
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT interaction_datetime, customer_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM inquiries ORDER BY inquiry_datetime DESC;
SELECT customer_id, inquiry_topic FROM inquiries WHERE inquiry_topic LIKE '%support%';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY interaction_datetime DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(interaction_id) > 1
SELECT * FROM interactions JOIN inquiries ON interactions.customer_id = inquiries.customer_id
SELECT * FROM inquiries WHERE inquiry_topic LIKE '%complaint%' ORDER BY inquiry_datetime ASC
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, COUNT(interaction_id) FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id, interaction_type HAVING COUNT(interaction_id) > 2 ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE type='feedback';
SELECT id, inquiry_date, category FROM inquiries WHERE category='technical support';
SELECT id, interaction_date, description FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT id, customer_id, interaction_date, type, description FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT id, inquiry_date, category FROM inquiries WHERE category='Feedback' ORDER BY inquiry_date;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT id, customer_id, type, description FROM interactions WHERE type='Purchase' OR type='Support' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, inquiry_date, inquiry_details FROM customers INNER JOIN inquiries ON customers.customer_id = inquiries.customer_id;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_phone IS NOT NULL AND customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT c.customer_name, i.interaction_date, i.interaction_type FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE i.interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY i.interaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT p.product_name, p.product_price, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM products p JOIN interactions i ON p.product_id = i.customer_id GROUP BY p.product_name, p.product_price ORDER BY total_interactions DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_details FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100.00 AND category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT customer_name, products.product_name, orders.quantity FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.quantity >= 5 ORDER BY orders.quantity DESC, customer_name ASC;
